message:
Still problem is not over; again a mutilated message was encountered.  
The message was sent from server to client. The payload xml message contains exactly 431 characters. The received payload is exactly 4 characters too short.   
The received message is: "AC01 0000 partialpayload".  
The prefix "AC01" means 428, it is not 431, and the difference between 431 and 428 is 3 not four (which was expected because we tend to interpret the "0000" as a keepalive message.
